subject: Tennis
Rogers Cup (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga became the first Frenchman to win the Rogers Cup in the Open Era and became the first player to defeat four straight top-10 opponents at a Masters 1000 tournament since 2002.
snippet: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga became the first Frenchman to win the Rogers Cup in the Open Era and became the first player to defeat four straight top-10 opponents at a Masters 1000 tournament since 2002.
